Pre-Game Insights: Sunil Chhetri announced that his upcoming match against Kuwait will be his farewell match.
Others: The match is crucial for India to increase their chances of qualifying for the next round.
The match will be played at the Salt Lake stadium in Kolkata.
The match will start at 7 pm IST.
The match will be live streamed on JioCinema app and website.
The match will be live telecasted on Sports18 Network.
